CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 6, 1950, pg. 28 reads: "Annual Kay Banquet - The Rev. J.L. Dandridge delivering the principal address at the annual testimonial banquet of the Kay Boys' Club last Thursday. Leaders of various community organizations participated in banquet and were welcomed by Mrs. Margaret Lampkin, president of Kay Women's Auxiliary Unit No. 3.  Left to right, top: Mrs. Viola Sams, Mrs. Lampkin, the Rev. Mr. Dandridge, Mrs. Catherine Simonson and Mrs. William Howell.  Bottom: Marshall Stevenson, Mrs. Julia Gaines and James Reid. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of men and women seated at banquet tables in front of two head tables that include, top row: Margaret Lampkin, standing; Rev. J.L. Dandridge, Catherine Simonson, and Mrs. William Howell; bottom row center: Julia Gaines, wearing light colored hat with feather, seated between Marshall Stevenson and James Reid, gathered in Kay Boys Club for annual testimonial banquet
